events.message: I received my order last week, but I would like to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on customer's mention of refund and dissatisfaction.
A customer support agent was assigned to handle the refund request to provide further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund, and I am here to help you through this process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund request so we can proceed accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product arrived but it doesn’t work as described, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate a refund and provide you with a prepaid shipping label to return the item at no cost.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response! I’ll wait for the label to print and send the package back.
The refund request has been processed and a return shipping label has been sent to your email address.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to see if you have shipped the product back to us.
Yes, I have already sent the package back yesterday. Please let me know when the refund is completed.
The returned product has been received and your refund has been successfully processed. You should see the amount credited shortly.
We have closed your case after confirming the refund. Thank you for your patience, and please contact us if you need further assistance.
